---
title: Requirements
---


To run a pipeline from repository, please install the following dependencies:

* Bash
* Java (Java 11 or higher)
* Docker (Instructions [here](https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/))
* Nextflow (Optional, though [very easy to install](https://www.nextflow.io/index.html#GetStarted))

If you want to create new tasks / components, also install:

* [Viash](https://viash.io)
